1.title: The Dangers of Baking
1.plot: Nicole is excited to start her new job at NTG Today, a local Current Affairs TV Show, only she finds Boss is less than impressed with the idea and challenges her to a competition against her Nephew Antonio. Meanwhile Simon and Mike pass the time by playing a sneaky trick on Dilly, only Dilly takes it a little more seriously than they could have imagined. Guest starring Jarrad Courcha and David Partridge.

2.title: Spanish Lovers and Magical Weight Loss
2.plot: Nicole convinces Boss to give her a story, to her surprise she agrees. Dilly refuses entry to the Store Room for fear of death but discovers a kangaroo in the office. Mike asks Simon for advice on dating the opposite gender and ends up with a unique marketing gimmick. While at home Abbey inspires Nicole to keep working at her dreams and in doing so uncovers a dark secret. Guest starring Benidict Chau.

3.title: Love, Squelch and Mashed Potato
3.plot: Abbey sculpts Nicole's dinner into an abstract art piece, Nicole puts a plan into action for her to run her own news story behind Boss' back. Dilly gets excited about mashed potato. Simon agrees to help Nicole so he can catch up on eating pizza. Nicole discovers her top story is actually a set up involving a cult of farm animals. Guest starring Kristy Obst.

4.title: Uncle
4.plot: Low viewers instigate Boss to get out her Sacking Stick, Nicole unaware of this monthly ritual does nothing only to be sacked. Nicole goes to see her Uncle, who sits on the board of NTG Today, for help. Nicole's Uncle practices for a Cosplay convention as a knight fighting pandas and reveals he has a romantic interest in Nicole's mother. If Nicole is willing to set something up he'll help her out. Guest starring David Hayward

5.title: Personal Space
5.plot: Abbey reveals a special technique she uses to never get stressed and steals Nicole's lunch. Simon discovers that his chair height has been tampered with rendering him unable to work. Nicole stands up for strangers only to be cornered into running a story on a complete stranger to prove her point. Mike tries to help Simon get his chair height back only to be accused of sinister motives. Guest starring Steven Hooton.

6.title: Voodoo Love
6.plot: Simon discovers Dilly playing with a doll at work and convinces her it has dark magical powers. Mike asks Nicole for advice on his penis. Mike finds Dilly afraid of her doll and helps her out, Dilly is impressed by his show of manliness. Boss overhears and is excited to hear that Mike is single and traps him in her office. Now Dilly must save Mike from certain doom.

imdb.plot outline: Discover the world of NTG Today, a current affairs show in similar vain to Today Tonight except for one tiny crucial difference - they don't have any stories. Nicole tries to make a difference in a world full of spin and nonsense. Will she make a difference, or will it all come...
imdb.title: Blowflies
plot: Discover the world of NTG Today, a current affairs show in similar vain to Today Tonight except for one tiny crucial difference - they don't have any stories. Nicole tries to make a difference in a world full of spin and nonsense. Will she make a difference, or will it all come...::Jonny Walker
